description: Get the import job properties to learn more about the job or job progress.

nested_items.name: jobProperties
nested_items.description: The properties of the import job.

nested_items.name: jobStatus
nested_items.description: The filters for listing import jobs based on status.

nested_items.name: dataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that grants permissions to access medical imaging resources.

nested_items.name: endedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the import job was ended.

nested_items.name: submittedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the import job was submitted.

nested_items.name: inputS3Uri
nested_items.description: The input prefix path for the S3 bucket that contains the DICOM P10 files to be imported.

nested_items.name: outputS3Uri
nested_items.description: The output prefix of the S3 bucket to upload the results of the DICOM import job.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message thrown if an import job fails.
